full-course-offering.title: Human Biology
full-course-offering.description: Prerequisite: Completion of ENGL 095 and READ 095 with a minimum grade of C or ENGL/ 095 with a minimum grade of C and completion of MATH 090 or MATH 093 or BUS 110 with a minimum grade of C- or equivalent assessment in these areas
full-course-offering.prerequisites: Prerequisite: Completion of ENGL 095 and READ 095 with a minimum grade of C or ENGL/ 095 with a minimum grade of C and completion of MATH 090 or MATH 093 with a minimum grade of C- or equivalent assessment in these areas
